scripts.db:ping: docker exec -i cursor-workshop-pg pg_isready -U postgres -d postgres && echo '✅ Database is up and running' || echo '❌ Database is not ready'
scripts.psql: docker exec -it cursor-workshop-pg psql -U postgres -d postgres
scripts.db:tables: docker exec -i cursor-workshop-pg psql -U postgres -d postgres < ./sql/tables.sql
